channel.title: [Hyperion]Project Annihilation Running rep+
channel.description:
ok, if i try to run it with eclipse this error comes up:
[code]29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 29-apr-2010 18:13:44 org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 29-apr-2010 18:13:44 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... [/code]
This is the whole code, it says i know not all of the above is an error but still, i hope i explained enough.
i always rep++ For help.
Yes i use ecipse yes i exactly did what this video tells me: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoYKZ2xoXLM
- mpsmpsmsp

item.title: [Hyperion]Project Annihilation Running rep+
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

ok, if i try to run it with eclipse this error comes up:

29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 29-apr-2010 18:13:43 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 29-apr-2010 18:13:44 org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 29-apr-2010 18:13:44 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 29-apr-2010 18:13:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions...

This is the whole code, it says i know not all of the above is an error but still, i hope i explained enough.

i always rep++ For help.

Yes i use ecipse
yes i exactly did what this video tells me:
